pages.text: Death is no longer the end. For your items, anyway. Each time you die, your items are collected by the fey that live between worlds, who will $(action)bury it and place a headstone$() to mark the occasion of your death. They will also grant you $(item)a key$(), which will restore your inventory to you if presented to your headstone.

pages.title: Enchanted Grave Key
pages.text: Was your bed far from where you were exploring? No matter, simply $(action)enchant the key with an Ender Pearl$(), and it will return you to $(place)your grave$(). However, be wary for the beast that slew you, as it may still be nearby.
